issue.title: Update parser_urdf (URDF parser) to work with SDF 1.3 and SDF 1.4

content.raw:
I can't seem to attach files to this thread. [Here](http://farnsworth.csres.utexas.edu/patches/gazebo.visual_plugin_urdf.patch)'s a patch to allow visual plugins in URDF. Example syntax is below:

```
#!xml

<gazebo reference="my_link">
  <visual>
    <controller:vis_plugin_1 name="..." filename="...">
      ...parameters...
    </controller:vis_plugin_1>
  </visual>
  <visual>
    <controller:vis_plugin_2 name="..." filename="...">
      ...parameters...
    </controller:vis_plugin_2>
  </visual>
</gazebo>
```

As I was writing the xml out, I realized the way the patch works is that it expects one plugin per visual tag. Should be an easy fix though.
content.html:
I can't seem to attach files to this thread. Here's a patch to allow visual plugins in URDF. Example syntax is below:

<gazebo reference="my_link">
  <visual>
    <controller:vis_plugin_1 name="..." filename="...">
      ...parameters...
    </controller:vis_plugin_1>
  </visual>
  <visual>
    <controller:vis_plugin_2 name="..." filename="...">
      ...parameters...
    </controller:vis_plugin_2>
  </visual>
</gazebo>

As I was writing the xml out, I realized the way the patch works is that it expects one plugin per visual tag. Should be an easy fix though.
